description: Part redevelopment  part rehabilitation and part change of use to provide: 1) 26520 sq.m. for Business Use (Class B1). 2) 1064 sq.m. for class A1  A2 or A3 uses. 3) Two x 2 bedroom flats and one studio flat (240 sq.m.) along with the formation of a pedestrian area rear of Cowcross Street  and new vehicle access points from Benjamin Street  Britton Street and St. Johns Lane and opening up pedestrian routes. PROPOSED PLANS:PA/340B 341 342 343 350 351A 352A 353A 355A 356A 357A 358A 359A 360A 361A 362A 363A 365 366 367 368 371 372 373 374 375 376 377 378 380 381 382B 383B 384 385A 386A 387A 388A 389A 390A 391A.
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
